scripts.prepair-upgrade: npm run clean; mkdir -p ./build/contracts; cp -r ./buildsDeployed/deployed/* ./build/contracts/; npm run truffle-compile
scripts.verify-contracts: truffle run verify FloatToken LongShort@$LONGSHORT_IMPLEMENTATION Staker@$STAKER_IMPLEMENTATION FloatCapital_v0@$TREASURY_IMPLEMENTATIONTreasury_v0@$FLOAT_CAPITAL_IMPLEMENTATION FloatToken TokenFactory --network $NETWORK
scripts.update-testnet-contracts: yarn prepair-upgrade; rm -f .openzeppelin/unknown-{97,1337}.json; truffle migrate --network binanceTest --reset; mv .openzeppelin/unknown-1337.json .openzeppelin/unknown-97.json; yarn save-deployment
scripts.generate-test-contracts: mkdir -p codegen; cp -r contracts codegen; rm -rf codegen/contracts/testing; yarn truffle compile --contracts_directory codegen --contracts_build_directory codegen/truffle; node ../scripts/src/MockablesGen.bs.js; rescript format -all;
